caption.p:
Weight of mice Weights of Mice used in Acute Toxicity assay for Day 1, 7 and 14. R. vulgaris: Rhus vulgaris, a: Mouse No.1,
b : Mouse No. 2,
c : Mouse No. 3, R.v. 1
a : Oral dose of Rhus vulgaris (50 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 1, R.v. 1
b : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (50 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 2, R.v. 1
c : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (50 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 3, R.v. 2
a : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (300 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 1, R.v. 2
b : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (300 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 2, R.v. 2
b : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (300 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 2, R.v. 2
c : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (300 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 3, R.v. 3
a : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (2000 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 1, R.v. 3
b : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (2000 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 2, R.v. 3
c : Oral dose of R. vulgaris (2000 mg/kg) administered to Mouse No. 1
